menuItemSaveQuote.description: Title of context menu item that saves the selected text when clicked.

btnHighlightQuote.description: A button that highlights all occurrences of the quote on the page.

btnCopyQuote.description: A button that copies a quote to the user's clipboard.

btnDeleteQuote.description: A button that deletes a quote.

QuoteCopiedTitle.description: A title shown in a notification when the user copies a quote to their clipboard.

QuoteCopied.message: The quote was copied to your clipboard.
QuoteCopied.description: A paragraph shown in a notification when the user copies a quote to their clipboard.

QuoteDeletedTitle.description: A title shown in a notification when the user copies a quote to their clipboard.

QuoteDeleted.description: A paragraph shown in a notification when the user copies a quote to their clipboard.

NoQuotesYet.description: Title shown in sidebar when the current page does not have any quotes saved yet.

NoQuotes_GetStarted.message: Get started by selecting text on the page.
NoQuotes_GetStarted.description: Paragraph shown in sidebar when page does not have any quotes yet.

CloseDialog.description: Caption for screen readers to close a dialog.

NotSpecified.description: A placeholder shown when a page metadata element does not have a value yet.

btnCancel.description: Button text to not save changes.

MetadataForHostname.description: Page action caption for displaying article metadata (publish date, contributors, etc) for a webpage.

articleTitle.description: Label for the title of an article.

websiteTitle.description: Label for the title of the website

publisher.description: Label for the name of the article's publisher or sponsor

url.description: Label for the absolute URL for the article.

published.description: Label for the date the article was published online.

contributors.description: Label for contributors (author, editor, illustrator, etc) to the article.

MetadataUpdatedTitle.description: Title of a notification shown when user updates a page metadata element.

MetadataUpdated.message: This updated information will be used when exporting quotes.
MetadataUpdated.description: Message of a notification shown when user updates a page metadata element.

removeCustomization.message: Delete customization. Value will load from webpage if available.
removeCustomization.description: Title for a button that deletes custom metadata applied previously by the user

CustomizationRemoved.message: The customization has been removed. This metadata element will come from page metadata if available.
CustomizationRemoved.description: Notification message when the user removes a metadata customization.

DefaultSuggestion.message: Start typing to find a quote.
DefaultSuggestion.description: Shown when the user activates the extension omnibox

View all quotes.description: Browser action hover title. Takes user to homepage showing quotes that have been saved on any webpage.

QuoteaddedTitle.description: A title shown in a notification hen the user creates a new quote from highlighted text on a webpage.

QuoteAddedMessage.message: Access the quote in the quote sidebar (CTRL+Q).
QuoteAddedMessage.description: A paragraph shown in a notification when the user creates a new quote from highlighted text on a webpage.

btnAnnotate.description: Title for button when clicked opens an input text box for user to type notes about the quote.
